author: Arash-Jofrehei
body:
#### PR description:

Correcting the cross-talk effect on position reconstruction in the Phase-2 Inner Tracker detector. Arbitrary estimated couplings and a threshold are given as input parameters. Charges of marginal channels in a cluster are corrected wrt the couplings and the ones below the given threshold are set to zero. Clusters will be pruned if all channels of a row or column are zero and the cluster position will be recalculated.

#### PR validation:

The code has been validated using two particle gun samples of 100 GeV muons at eta 0, one with no xtalk and one with 10% xtalk between pixels of odd rows and the next row.
title: Correcting Cross-Talk Effect in The Phase-2 Inner Tracker Detector
